name: microservices-app
description: A TypeScript microservices application with product management and segmentation

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=./services/product-service" "npm run dev --workspace=./services/main-service" "npm run dev --workspace=./frontend" "npm run dev --workspace=./services/cron"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace=./services/product-service" "npm run start --workspace=./services/main-service" "npm run start --workspace=./frontend" "npm run start --workspace=./services/cron"
